encrypted.title: Private by Design

timer.title: Timed Expiry
timer.description: Set a custom expiry from 5 minutes to 7 days. Notes auto-delete even if never opened.

step3.title: Gone

cta.title: Try it now
cta.description: No signup, no spam, no tracking - just private notes that vanish.
